entry.title: Sunday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 24 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 24 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
